manifest.name: Torrentio
manifest.description: Provides torrent streams from scraped torrent providers. Currently supports YTS(+), EZTV(+), RARBG(+), 1337x(+), ThePirateBay(+), KickassTorrents(+), TorrentGalaxy(+), HorribleSubs(+), NyaaSi(+), NyaaPantsu(+), Rutor(+), Comando(+), ComoEuBaixo(+), Lapumia(+), OndeBaixa(+), Torrent9(+). To configure providers, RealDebrid/Premiumize/AllDebrid/DebridLink/Put.io support and other settings visit https://torrentio.strem.fun

manifest.name: Torrentio Lite
manifest.description: Preconfigured Lite version of Torrentio addon. To configure advanced options visit https://torrentio.strem.fun/lite

manifest.name: ThePirateBay+
manifest.description: Search for movies, series and anime from ThePirateBay

manifest.name: Torrentio Brazuca
manifest.description: Preconfigured version of Torrentio addon for Brazilian content. To configure advanced options visit https://torrentio.strem.fun/brazuca

manifest.name: Brazuca Torrents
manifest.description: Fornece streams de filmes e series dublados de provedores de torrent. Suporta atualmente BluDV(+), Comando(+), ComoEuBaixo(+), DarkMahou(+), EraiRaws(+), Lapumia(+), OndeBaixa(+), ShinMeikai(+), VacaTorrent(+). (This addon was made based on Torrentio, all credits are to its creator).

manifest.description: This extension was created due to the need to display more years in the filter per year, the native Stremio extension allows you to filter only the last 15 years, I applied support that allows you to filter up to the last 150 years, (CINEMETA) displays 500 records instead of 100 records

manifest.name: Orion
manifest.description: Orion Stremio Addon, allows Orion-indexed torrent, usenet and hoster links to be played on Stremio. Cached links can be played with RealDebrid, Premiumize or Offcloud.
